summary: A group of men and two female stenographers scientifically study sex.
cast: Dermot Mulroney|Julie Delpy|Robin Tunney|Neve Campbell|Jeremy Davies|Alan Cumming|Til Schweiger|John Light|Nick Nolte|Terrence Howard|Emily Bruni|Tuesday Weld|Jacqueline Anderson|Marc Hosemann|Joseph May|Harvey Friedman|Jeff Caster|Sparka Lee Hall
title: Misterios del sexo
